title: Parashant Grand Canyon-Parashant National Monument: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Caution        Fire Restrictions In Effect  Alert 1 , Severity ,caution ,, Fire Restrictions In Effect  Applies to wood fires, charcoal, smoking in certain areas, use of torches and other open flames, and certain equipment. Portable stoves with gas, jellied petroleum, or pressurized liquid fuel are allowed. Select More for full details. more
